name: Maria Mancini - Maduro - Robusto Larga
additionalNotes: The original Maria Mancini assortment is a celebrated, Cuban-styled premium cigar, that’s been a hit among seasoned cigar purists for over 25 years. These exceptionally made cigars come handcrafted in a stunning box-pressed presentation, and are available in two distinct varieties. The first uses a decadent H2000 wrapper, and a rich blend of aged fillers, to deliver an intricate, yet exceptionally balanced profile of creamy and spicy nuances. Maria Mancini Maduro cigars utilize a dark and delectable Honduran Maduro wrapper, over a bold blend of hearty long-filler tobaccos. To this day, Maria Mancini continues to be a popular selection for medium to full-bodied cigar enthusiasts in search of an incredibly deep and intricate flavor profile.
